title: Data Analysis: Exam Grades
question_text: Suppose the grades on a statistics exam range from $65$ to $95$ . The professor states that approximately $68\%$ of the class got between a $75$ and $85$ , and $95\%$ of the class got between a $70$ and $90$ . What type of distribution is this? What is the mean, and what is the standard deviation?

choices.text: Normal distribution; μ = 80 ; σ = 5 μ = 80 ; σ = 5
Uniform distribution; μ = 80 ; σ = 30 μ = 80 ; σ = 30
Binomial distribution; μ = 80 ; σ = 5 μ = 80 ; σ = 5
Normal distribution; μ = 80 ; σ = 10 μ = 80 ; σ = 10
Binomial distribution; μ = 80 ; σ = 30 μ = 80 ; σ = 30
